title.rendered: “IDF Launches Manhunt After Shooting Attack Near Nabi Elias: Two Soldiers Injured”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Following the initial report, assailants opened fire from a passing vehicle toward a military force that was on a mission to protect the route near Nabi Elias in the Ephraim Brigade.
IDF forces have launched a manhunt for the assailants, reinforcing routes and surrounding villages in the area.

As a result of the shooting attack, two IDF soldiers operating in the area were lightly injured, and one additional soldier was moderately injured. The soldiers were evacuated for medical treatment at a hospital, and their families have been informed.

Attached is documentation from the situational assessment at the scene of the attack in the Ephraim Brigade: https://bit.ly/3Ydj2aY

Attached are photos on the subject: https://idfanc.activetrail.biz/ANC2507202487346
